inclusion.criterion: developmental assessments at first and last week of intervention
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: driving and socialization behaviors videotaped for 1 hour/session, one session/week before, during and after intervention phase
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: participants wear accelerators on wrists to monitor physical activity during 1 hour videotaping session
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Cohen's kappa coefficient calculated between two independent coders for good reliability before formal coding
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: caregivers identify goals and measure progress using goal-attainment scaling (GAS) before and after intervention
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 9-week intervention phase with 2 hours/session, 2 sessions/week for total of 9 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: natural play and driving performance videotaped by research team during intervention phase
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: goal-oriented driving in a hospital and bi-manual use in functional tasks for exploration in bi-manual training
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: family, treating therapist and research team

inclusion.criterion: car driving training includes 2 phases: I-car exploration and II-prompted driving
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bi-manual training involves activities such as perceptual motor tasks, holding and manipulative tasks, posture and balance, self-care and activities of daily living
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: family, treating therapist and research team

inclusion.criterion: early mobility training program with similar guidelines to ROCBT except for bi-manual training
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: regular therapy group continues regular therapy including physical, occupational and speech therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: severe sensory impairments such as blindness or deafness
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: parents/caregivers unable to make time commitment for training phase
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of tremors and Wilson disease, but meets inclusion criteria with appropriate treatment and support.
